name: MultiTable
description: A fluid multi-table layout. Each table groups subjects together under a shared parent.

releaseNotes.0.0.2: Add more fields to the contents of the Sample modal.
releaseNotes.0.0.3: Use handlebars templates; move external libraries to /lib
releaseNotes.0.0.4: Added spacing so that the perspective switcher doesn't block anything.
releaseNotes.0.0.5: Tags are array of strings now, not array of objects
releaseNotes.0.0.9: Oops... fix date display page header
releaseNotes.1.0.9: Fix showing awesome template before load
releaseNotes.1.0.10: Bug fixes: data undefined error, sample update error, subjectSorter error
releaseNotes.1.0.14: Apply showAll value to new groups
releaseNotes.1.0.15: Fix blank header for root subject group
releaseNotes.1.0.18: Show aspect help links and related links in sample modal
releaseNotes.1.0.19: Aspect name case insensitivity - missed one
releaseNotes.1.0.20: Add google analytics tracking for search, onclick modals and links, and toggle checkbox
releaseNotes.1.0.22: Add RealtimeChangeHandler arg validation and tests
releaseNotes.1.0.23: Update the sample update handler to add a sample if it's not already being tracked
releaseNotes.1.0.24: Remove subject.children from subject groups inventory
releaseNotes.1.0.25: Add null checks for isUnderRootSubject arguments and sample name
releaseNotes.1.0.26: Fix bug with removing/adding root subject
releaseNotes.1.1.2: set the legend as fixed-position at top of page
releaseNotes.1.1.3: add bottom border to legend now that it's fixed-position
releaseNotes.1.1.4: display value label in sample modal when provided
releaseNotes.1.1.5: display messageCode, messageBody, value and value label separately
releaseNotes.1.1.6: fix the if conditions for messageCode, messageBody, value in sample modal
releaseNotes.1.1.7: fix duplicate rows/columns bug - add lowercase version of name to aspectsToShow/subjectsToShow sets
